system.description:
You have both potent psionics and magical learning at your fingertips, giving you access to many of the mystical levers that control reality. You gain the following benefits:

  • Your Intelligence score increases by 1, to a maximum of 20.
  • You gain proficiency with the Insight skill or an expertise die if you are already proficient.
  • Half your wizard levels count as esper levels for the purpose of the Attack Modes feature.
  • Half your esper levels count as wizard levels for the purpose of the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.iqlgotutphoratct]{Arcane Recovery} feature. You still cannot get back spell slots higher than the maximum wizard spell slot level you have access to.
  • All spells from the psionic and psychic schools count as wizard spells for you. Other wizards can only copy one of these spells from your spellbook if it is normally a wizard spell. You learn a 1st- or 2nd- level spell of your choice from the psychic or psionic school. It is added to your wizard spellbook for free.
system.prerequisite: 3 levels in esper, 3 levels in wizard
